title: 2017 URF
body: Is URF coming out this year and if it is, when is it coming out?

replies.body: I don't know for sure when the next time URF will be coming around, but be sure to check the PBE Patch Notes (which will have the next rotating game mode) and our [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) as well.
